welcomePage.title: WOLips
welcomePage.intro: This page will help familiarize you with WOLips. To get started, read the sections below and click on the related links.
welcomePage.item: The WOLips Perspective To do WO development open to the WOLips Perspective by selecting Window > Open Perspective > other > WOLips.
Create New Application To start create a application project.
Learn more To learn more you can browse the WOLips User Guide.
